UniprotID	Q96EL1

EntryName	INKA1_HUMAN
ProteinName	PAK4-inhibitor INKA1 (Induced in neural crest by AP2-alpha protein homolog) (Inca) (Inka-box actin regulator 1)
GeneName	INKA1 C3orf54 FAM212A
Length	287
Function	Inhibitor of the serine/threonine-protein kinase PAK4 (PubMed:26607847). Acts by binding PAK4 in a substrate-like manner, inhibiting the protein kinase activity (PubMed:26607847).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm
